main: ^God damn you! You couldn't just leave it alone, couldja? Had to piss away years of my work!
^Bastard. What work? Stealing from these people, ruining their lives? Ruining my life! And for what?
^For what? For what? I was gonna change everything! Cut the government out, from both coasts! This was my shot!
^You turned this valley into a nightmare! What did you think was going to happen? That Manifest could still operate here?
^Woulda made Manifest rich. They all woulda seen. You and those damn cultists trippin' over yerselves to stand in my way... ruined it all...
^Typical. I do not know why I expected anything more from the likes of you.
^You seemed eager to bring Hell to the valley, Overseer. I hope you enjoy seeing it for yourself.
